features: 【CUTE FRICTION POWER CARS】Colorful toys for 1 year old boy set consists of 4 inertial construction vehicles: dump truck, cement mixer, bulldozer and tractor. Various toy cars can let your baby know and identify different cars. Equipped so that boys can experience fun by friction powered car, suitable for kids age 18 months and up.

【AWESOME 4-WD DESIGN】Toddler car toys with moving mechanisms are super easy to power with no battery required, toddler boy toys can easily move forward on any surface faster and further! Kids enjoy these toddler toys age 1-2 for transporting sand and other materials in playrooms, sandboxes and anywhere.

【GREAT EARLY EDUCATION TOYS】Baby boy toys have flexible joints and can be adjusted freely. They can swing, turn over and bending like real engineering vehicles, can improve kids fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination. The detachable parts and bright colors of trucks toys deeply attract baby's attention, stimulate their imagination and encourage them to explore new world.

【100% SAFETY& DURABLE】Construction vehicles toys set is made of high-quality ABS plastic, no sharp corners and small parts. Even if your child put it in mouth careless, it is safe for kids completely. These baby toys very visually appealing whether in the game room or in outdoor, great toddler toy car for age 1-3!

【BEST GIFTS FOR KIDS 】This baby toy is perfectly sized for baby’s little hands to train baby’s grasp ability, portable outside toys for toddlers 1-3. Perfect as Easter gifts, Christmas gifts, Chriden's day gifts, Halloween gifts, New Year Gifts, Thanksgiving Day Gifts, Valentine Gifts, Party Favor and Birthday gifts for 1 2 3 year old kids boys girls.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ORWINE are committed to developing fun, innovative, high quality products for children of all ages. ✔Enjoy excellent toddler toys to enhance parent-child relationship. Perfect outdoor travel toy for toddlers 1 2 3 year old, enjoy beach, camp, park game! The kids car toy sets, whether in the game room or outdoors. Perfect travel toys for boys and girls aged 12-18 months. Baby after 18 months old is sensitive about small things and focuses on observation.Besides, they can remember the difference between subtle things. For example, to distinguish the difference of car models, car emblems and clothes pattern.

Well Made & 100% Safe: Material: sturdy ABS + alloy.Perfect for little hands, No sharp edges.Customer Feedback: Still look and work like construction toys are brand new after long time play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old grandson LOVES these trucks. One of his little buddies love them so much when he came over to play we ordered a set for him too! Perfect size for little hands and they seem durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an excellent set of toy vehicles
reviews.reviewText: Love these toys - durable and fun to play with!Grandkids love 'em too when I feel like sharing.Really happy with the value - I honestly did not expect to be as impressed with as I am. Great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for grandson and he loves them. They can move once you touch or push the slightest. Sturdy construction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made well! Solid value. Perfect for 1-4 year-olds.
reviews.reviewText: These are really sturdy, and will keep rolling for over 20 feet once the inertial flywheel is sped up. They can roll up and over obstacles well too, with the impressive four-wheel drive operation and straight-ahead alignment.I did a lot of research, and found these to be perfect "birthday favors" for eight "Twos Room" children. Pro tip: use masking tape or similar to label the bottom with kids' names, so it is clear whose is whose. More toys built to last like these, please!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These little vehicles are solid and cute!
reviews.reviewText: We use them for sandbox toys!

reviews.reviewText: Age appropriate with hours of entertainment

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for 2 year old

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They go far with little effort, they are nice sturdy quality, and I’m not worried about little pieces being snapped and choked on. Excellent toys, my little dude loves them.
